translations: n.[电]电位；潜能（potential 的复数）

phrs.translation: [经]市场潜力；市场潜在需求量
潜在价值；位势值；平衡值
[生理学]（大脑皮质的）激发性电位
水势；水潜能；静水压；水位

sentences.sentence: Subsequently developed methods of recording and analyzing nerve potentials failed to reveal any such qualitative diversity.
sentences.translation: 后来发展的记录和分析神经电位的方法并没有揭示出任何这种质量上的差异。

sentences.sentence: First of all, he wanted to embed in his upcoming high potentials, the user application of really advanced investment theory.
sentences.translation: 首先，他想在他即将到来的高潜力中，嵌入真正先进的投资理论的用户应用。

sentences.sentence: It is my contention that death and murder always lurk as potentials in violent relationships.
sentences.translation: 我的观点是，在暴力关系中总是潜伏着死亡和谋杀的可能。
